articles.title: Kansas mom charged with leading all-female ISIS battalion in Syria - New York Post
articles.description: Allison Fluke-Ekren, 42, allegedly trained her own children to use AK-47s and suicide belts, and conspired to plan an attack on an American college campus, the DOJ said.
articles.content:
A former Kansas woman and mother of five has been charged with joining ISIS and leading an all-female battalion of fighters in Syria, the Department of Justice announced Saturday.

articles.title: Bank of America says it sees seven Fed rate hikes this year - Reuters
articles.description: Bank of America economists said on Friday that they expect the Federal Reserve to hike rates by 25 basis points seven times this year, beginning in March, adopting one of the most aggressive views on Fed tightening among major banks.
